body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have an Eldrazi spawn token and Skullclamp 
2. Also 2 other creatures 
3. Lands are all Tapped What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Should see spawn token as a mana source to activate Skullclamp - does not appear as a choice What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? V. 1.21  - OSX 10.6 Please provide any additional information below. picture shows mogg as able to sac but not token
author: [taf...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/114851566410942628096/)
title: Can not Sac Spawn Token to activate Skullclamp

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision e4e7c938a8e5 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Thanks for the report.

The Eldrazi Spawn token mistakenly needed to tap to sacrifice and since the code said it couldn't, it didn't work.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

content:
_From [taf...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/114851566410942628096/) on December 30, 2011 03:31:40_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have an Eldrazi spawn token and Skullclamp 
2. Also 2 other creatures 
3. Lands are all Tapped What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Should see spawn token as a mana source to activate Skullclamp - does not appear as a choice What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? V. 1.21  - OSX 10.6 Please provide any additional information below. picture shows mogg as able to sac but not token

**Attachment:** [can't sac spawn token to activate clamp.tiff](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=129)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=129_
